comment: Slice it however you want . You can't simultaneously argue the UK can flourish outside of the EU , but Scotland can't flourish outside the UK .
amr:
# ::snt Slice it however you want . You can't simultaneously argue the UK can flourish outside of the EU , but Scotland can't flourish outside the UK .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / slice-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (ii / it)
            :ARG1-of (w / want-01
                  :ARG0 y))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (a / argue-01
                        :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                        :ARG1 (p2 / possible-01
                              :ARG1 (f / flourish-01
                                    :ARG1 (c2 / country
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "UK"))
                                    :location (o / outside
                                          :op1 (o2 / organization
                                                :name (n2 / name
                                                      :op1 "EU")))))
                        :mod (s2 / simultaneous)))
            :ARG2 (p3 / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (f2 / flourish-01
                        :ARG1 (c3 / country
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Scotland"))
                        :location o))))

comment: Theoreticaly you can because Scotland is not an homogenous subsample of UK . It is a hard sell though ..
amr:

(m / multi-sentence

            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (s / subsample-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (c2 / country
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "UK"))
                        :mod (h / homogeneous)
                        :domain (c3 / country
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Scotland")))))
      :snt2 (h2 / have-concession-91
            :ARG1 (s2 / sell-01
                  :ARG1 (ii / it)
                  :ARG1-of (h3 / hard-02))))
